segments.text: You mustn't touch the wet paint , Bill .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry . I won't do it again .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Try to be more careful in future .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I shall . I wasn't as careless as John Sampson . He walked across that wet cement over there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The workmen oughtn't to leave it without a no tice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The headmaster asked them not to do so .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then why isn't there a notice ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They went to their stores to get one . Here they come with it now !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But look at them ! They've forgotten about the wet cement and they're walking across it to put up the notice !
segments.speaker: S1
